code: @Test public void testComponentPropertyPlaceholder() throws Exception {     SedaComponent myseda = (SedaComponent) context.getComponent("myseda", false).     assertNotNull(myseda).     assertEquals(2, myseda.getQueueSize()).     // test that the custom component works     int before = myseda.getQueueReference("myseda://foo").getQueue().size().     assertEquals(0, before).     template.sendBody("direct:start", "Hello World").     int after = myseda.getQueueReference("myseda://foo").getQueue().size().     assertEquals(1, after). }
